data.name: Maximize the sum
data.description:
You are given:

```
int[] position
    where
        0 < position.length <= 10^6
        forall i: 0 < position[i] <= 10^6
int[] values
    where 
        values.length == position.length
        forall i: 0 < values[i] <= 100
int d
    where
        0 < d <= Integer.MAX_VALUE
```


Your task:
```
Find a subset of indices S s.t:
Sum(i in S, values[i]) is maximized
and
forall i,j in S: (i != j) ==> |position[i] - position[j]| > d
```

Return the maximum value of `Sum(i in S, values[i])`

After the fixed tests, there are two suites of random input testing:

The first one is on array lengths up to `10`. The second one is on array lengths up to `10^6`
